full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 (Country emblem) Agustin Garay Jaime (Ilegible seal) Civil Status Recording Officer of the People of the Town of Tisma, Masaya Department Certifies That on pages # 1. That on the Birth Certificates' Reinstatement Books that this office is using during the year nineteen seventy-six, the following certificate was recorded as follows: Certificate # 2. In the town of Tisma, Department of Masaya, at three twenty of the afternoon of March thirty of the year nineteen seventy-six. In front of the undersigned Civil Status' Recording Officer and the authorizing Secretary, appear before them: Gustavo Roman Jarquin, of legal age, married, farmer, of this domicile, and presents for its inscription the reinstatement of the birth certificate ordered by the Civil Status' District Judge of Masaya, at eleven thirty of the mooring of the twenty four of March of the year nineteen seventy-six in which he orders the reinstatement of the birth certificate of Josefa Matilde Romano Regidor. She was born in this town at seven past meridian on the fifth day of April of the year nineteen twelve, daughter of Messrs. Concepcion Romano Trejos and Estebana Regidor Morales, both of legal ages, married, the first one named, a farmer, and the second one, a housewife, both of this domicile. The undersigned Registrar witnesses thereof, to have had in front of him the reinstatement judgment, and made a notation on its margin, of the place where it was omitted. The original diligence's were filed in this office, having annotated at the bottom of the inscription, the number and date of the birth and the page of the book in which it was registered. Once read and found in order, it is approved and signed. It is the same as the original; at the request of the interested party, I issue this on the thirty first day of the month of March nineteen seventy- six. Gustavo Roman J., Agustin Garay J., Sandra Selva S. (Signature) Agustin Garay J. (Municapal Seal of the Town of Tisma, Department of Masaya) Recording Officer of the Civil Status of the People (Signature) Sandra Selva Secretary I THE UNDERSIGNED A NOTARY PUBLIC FOR THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA COUNTY OF SANTA CLARA DO HEREBY CER TIFY THAT THE ABOVE TRANSLATION IS THE TRUE COM PLETE AND CORRECT TRANSLATION OF A DOCUMENT IN SPANISH LANGUAGE PRESENTED TO ME. THAT I THE NOTARY BILINGUAL AM QUALIFIED TO CERTIFY IT. Donald Numez DONALD NUNEZ. DATE, , DECEMBER 27, 1995. 13785 STORY RD. STE. 3 IANN SAN JOSE CA 95127 (408) 259-1044
